DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Radiation therapy use high-energy x-ray kill tumor cell . Indinavir ritonavir may stop growth tumor cell block enzymes need cell growth . It yet know whether external-beam radiation therapy effective without indinavir ritonavir treat patient brain metastasis . PURPOSE : This randomized phase II trial study external-beam radiation therapy alone see well work compare external-beam radiation therapy give together indinavir ritonavir treat patient brain metastasis .
DOC.brief_title: External-Beam Radiation Therapy With Without Indinavir Ritonavir Treating Patients With Brain Metastases
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Compare efficacy , term time treatment failure CNS level 4-months treatment failure rate , patient brain metastasis treat external-beam radiotherapy combination indinavir sulfate ritonavir versus external-beam radiotherapy alone . - Prospectively investigate efficacy potentially antiangiogenic agent , indinavir sulfate . - Investigate antineoplastic activity indinavir sulfate combination ionize radiation cancer patient metastatic disease brain . OUTLINE : Patients randomize 1 2 treatment arm . - Arm I : Patients undergo radiotherapy brain daily , 5 day week 2 week ( 10 dos total ) . Patients also receive oral indinavir sulfate oral ritonavir twice daily 35 day begin day 1 radiotherapy . - Arm II : Patients undergo radiotherapy brain daily , 5 day week 2 week ( 10 dos total ) . Patients complete quality life questionnaire , include QOL-30 Mini Mental Status Examination , baseline , 2 week completion radiotherapy , 1 3 month completion study treatment . After completion study treatment , patient follow periodically least 4 month .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : Histologically confirm metastatic cancer brain metastasis Biopsy brain metastasis require All cancer type allow , except follow : Prostatic adenocarcinoma Sarcoma Melanoma Germ cell carcinoma , Smallcell lung cancer Measurable disease MRI brain Not require immediate surgical decompression ( may qualify surgery , remain measurable brain lesion ) PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : ECOG performance status 02 ( corresponds recursive partition analysis group I II ) Life expectancy > 4 month Able understand aim trial comply followup No HIV seropositivity PRIOR CONCURRENT THERAPY : Prior dexamethasone allow provide tapered initiation study radiotherapy Not require cytotoxic treatment within 3 month study radiotherapy At least 1 week since prior concurrent phenytoin
